title: Cozy Mountain Studio with Fireplace in Heart of Koscielisko
description: Discover this welcoming and modern studio nestled in the scenic expanse of Koscielisko, ideal for those seeking comfort and efficiency. This 38 sqm studio features a spacious open-plan bedroom and living area, a contemporary bathroom, and thoughtfully designed interiors. Enjoy relaxing evenings by the fireplace or make use of the smart home system for seamless living. Large windows let in plenty of natural light and frame inspiring mountain views.
neighborhood_description: The Koscielisko neighborhood is a peaceful retreat beloved for its close-knit community and tranquil, pet-friendly ambiance. Despite its quiet mountain charm, shopping and dining spots are readily accessible within a short drive, and the highway connects you quickly to Zakopane and beyond. Perfect for nature lovers and anyone who values green open spaces—and a friendly local spirit.
target_buyer: Ideal for professionals relocating for work who crave a blend of efficiency, natural surroundings, and modern home comfort.
market_positioning: This studio offers unique value in the local market with its blend of sustainable features and peaceful location, making it especially attractive to young professionals or singles who desire easy highway access, energy savings, and lifestyle convenience.
